articles.title: Start a simple budget
articles.body: List essentials first, then fun, then savings.

articles.title: Disbursement 101
articles.body: If you get 2 disbursements, plan per term before dividing by months.

articles.title: Use public transport
articles.body: Get a student bus or metro pass instead of paying for gas and parking.

articles.title: Smart grocery shopping
articles.body: Plan meals before shopping to spend less and waste less.

articles.title: Student Meal Deals
articles.body: Sign up for student discount programs at local shoppes around you!

articles.title: Apply for scholarships early
articles.body: Search and apply for scholarships before deadlines to get free funding.

articles.title: Build credit wisely
articles.body: Use a student credit card for small purchases and pay it off monthly.

articles.title: Emergency fund first
articles.body: Save at least $100 as a small emergency cushion before big expenses.
